mapper.insert:
insert into user_sign_record (
id,
org_code,
site_code,
user_code,
wave_code,
job_code,
sign_date,
sign_in_time,
sign_out_time,
ref_plan_key,
ref_grid_key,
ref_station_key,
create_user,
create_user_name,
update_user,
update_user_name,
create_time,
update_time,
yn,
ts,
) values (
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{waveCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{jobCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{refPlanKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refStationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
)
mapper.update:
update user_sign_record
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wave_code = #{waveCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
job_code = #{jobCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
sign_in_time = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sign_out_time = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ref_plan_key = #{refPlanKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_grid_key = #{refGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_station_key = #{refStationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_sign_record set
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from user_sign_record r
order by r.ts desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.sql: left outer join work_station s on r.ref_station_key = s.business_key and s.yn = 1 left outer join work_station_grid g on r.ref_grid_key = g.business_key and g.yn = 1 left outer join work_station_attend_plan p on r.ref_grid_key = p.ref_grid_key and r.wave_code = p.wave_code and p.yn = 1
mapper.select:
select count(1) from (select t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,max(t.ref_plan_key) ref_plan_key,max(t.ref_station_key) ref_station_key from user_sign_record t
group by t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code) r
mapper.sql:
left outer join ( select t.ref_grid_key, t.wave_code, count(distinct t.user_code) now_attend_num from user_sign_record t
group by t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code ) r2 on r.ref_grid_key = r2.ref_grid_key and r.wave_code = r2.wave_code
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM user_sign_record WHERE yn = 1 AND sign_in_time < #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND sign_out_time IS NULL LIMIT #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_sign_record SET update_time = #{param.updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{param.updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_name = #{param.updateUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_out_time = #{param.signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE yn = 1 AND id IN
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
